parameters.name: showAllVersions
parameters.description: Set true for results from deleted or archived quotes. Set false to omit records from deleted or archive quotes. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: includeFields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to return.

parameters.name: conditions
parameters.description: Conditional retrieve statements.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page of results to get. 1-index based.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size of results to get. Max size 1000, default 50.

basic.description:
< p > Authentication is similar to Manage, using Basic Authorization. Each request needs to pass an Authorization header that is a Base64 encoded username:password, where username is a combination of AccessKey+SellAPIUsername and password is password. (Full Authorization header would be "accesskey+username:password"). Your accesskey can be found by logging into Sell and checking the parameters listed in the URL.

The user must be an API user.

C# Sample

string auth = Convert.ToBase64String(System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(accessKey + "+" + SellAPIUsername + ":" + sellPassword));

client.Headers.Add("Authorization:basic " + auth);
